name: EDEN_WebGL
description:
Help build a colony for your humans and survive goblin attacks by collecting stone and wood and building homes and defences in this 2D base building strategy adventure demo made in Unity.  Destroy all the goblin nests to win.  Continue playing after winning for the bonus goblin onslaught that you are unlikely to survive.

Controls

Left mouse button to select things and command things.

Right mouse button deselects anything selected and closes any open UI windows

Middle mouse button or -/= keys to zoom in/out of map

Hold middle mouse button or use arrow keys  to move the map.

ESC key pauses and opens settings
